title: "Fast Rebalancing Therapy for Quantum Thinking"
first_phrase: In this final section of the manual, the author introduces Fast Rebalancing Therapy 2, which can be used as a main or adjunct therapy to restore harmony in the body. The technique involves a blend of non-verbal cues such as light observation, magnetic passes, and head balancing to stimulate "quantum thinking" and solutions. The author recommends several readings on mental magnetism, personal magnetism, and Yoga science to complement this therapy.
content: RECOMMENDED READINGS Mental Magnetism http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=301 Mental Fascination http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=286 Cultivation of Personal Magnetism http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=282 Thought Force in Business http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=94 Hindoo and Oriental Methods http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=79 Instantaneous Magnetism http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=300 Hindu-Yogi Science of Breath http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=64 Atkinson - Art and Science of Personal Magnetism http://www.pnl-nlp.org/courses/ebooks/index.php?bid=88
last_phrase: In conclusion, these recommended readings offer valuable resources for those seeking to enhance their personal magnetism and thought force. By practicing mental magnetism, fascination, and cultivating personal magnetism, while also exploring Hindoo and Oriental methods, instantaneous magnetism, and the Hindu-Yogi Science of Breath, readers can gain a deeper understanding of this important area. Atkinson's Art and Science of Personal Magnetism book is a valuable addition to the list that can help readers to master these techniques further.
